content.raw: Sorry a little late to this. I saw the PR notification but somehow I thought it’s for `ogre2`. A while ago I already ported the ogre1.x version of the MovableText class to [OgreText](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/src/ea009673f7d5525d7b19b2e908fdd3afd6adf7db/ogre/src/OgreText.cc#lines-33) class. It’s used in the [text\_geom](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/src/ign-rendering2/examples/text_geom/) demo. I have not ported it to `ogre2` yet though.
